card.text: 1R, {T}, sacrifice a creature: Draw a card. Team (Cast either side or both. When you cast both, the back is a token.) --- (Back): Dream Oni

card.name: Dream Oni
card.text: Flying, Vigilance When Dream Oni dies, draw a card. --- (Front): CT04 Nightmare Oni

card.name: CT05 Demiplanar Guide
card.text: Whenever CT05 Demiplanar Guide attacks, it and another creature you control can’t be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less this turn. Team (Cast either side or both. When you cast both, the back is a token.) --- (Back): Demiplanar Traveler

card.name: Demiplanar Traveler
card.text: Haste --- (Front): CT05 Demiplanar Guide

card.name: CA01 Centennial Celebrants
card.text: Centennial Celebrants is all colors. Bystander (This can’t attack or block.) When Centennial Celebrants enters the battlefield, search your library for a basic land and put it into your hand. Shuffle.

card.name: CA03 Delivery Truck
card.text: When Delivery Truck enters or attacks, scry 2. Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or greater: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: CA04 Centennial Sentinal
card.text: This spell costs {1} less for each member of your sentai. (Your sentai is up to one creature of each color.)

card.name: UBXX Legion, Summon
card.text: {B}: If UBXX Legion, Summon isn’t monstrous, monstrify 1 it. BB: If UBXX Legion, Summon is not an Army, double the number of counters on it and it becomes an Army in addition to its other types. BBB: If UBXX Legion, Summon is an army, it gains “Creature you control with counters are have menace.”
